website_summaries.verdict: A bath soak that can help with skin conditions like acne and psoriasis.
pros: Contains lots of beneficial minerals (for bathing)
Lots of happy users with reduced psoriasis symptoms
cons: Rare complaints about the integrity of the packaging

customer_reviews.title: Relax
customer_reviews.text: Don't you feel relaxed now? That I've told you to relax? Seriously though. I take salt bathes all the time and feel super relaxed and limber. Plus, if you hang out with any psychic vampires, you can recharge yourself with a salt bath soak.
customer_reviews.author: hkudra

customer_reviews.title: True to it’s label-pure Dead Sea salt
customer_reviews.text: I love how the only ingredient in this is pure Dead Sea salt. Other brands I’ve purchased most always contain other minerals such as Epsom salt, Himalayan and so on-therefore “watering” down the healing powers of pure Dead Sea minerals. After taking a 20-25 min soak before bedtime in this, I really felt skin relief and rejuvenation.
customer_reviews.author: Thesummit

customer_reviews.title: BIG DIFFERENCE, NOW AFTER 2 MONTHS, FANTASTIC,
customer_reviews.text: YOU REALLY FEEL BETTER AFTER THESE MINERALS SOAK ON YOU. SKIN IS SOFTER. USE IN HOT TUB TOO. EVERYONE LOVES THEM. AFTER 2 MONTHS IT'S FANTASTIC! THE WATER IS ALWAYS CLEAR NOW. THE FILTER DOESN'T GET BROWN. IT DOESN'T SMELL. I PUT IN DEAD SEA MINERALS. MY WIFE LOVES IT AND SAYS IT FEELS SO MUCH BETTER LIKE GOING IN THE OCEAN. GET IT !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful treatment for a skin condition
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what my grandson's condition I just know its raised and itchy-terribly itchy. Soaking in a warm tub with these salts just once a week takes the terrible itch away and the skin reverts to normal skin. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Unscented. Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these multiple times.I use this to make homemade bath soak. They are unscented so I can scent them myself. Very good quality dead sea salt!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product wow. My mom hurt her foot on a hike and soaked her foot in these salts, she felt immediate results. I will buy this product again in a heartbeat! It would be a great present as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Clean
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice fresh scent. We purchase salt to use for cleansings. You get a lot of salt for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Luv

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly therapeutic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sea salt is so incredibly relaxing! I really look forward to taking baths now and I feel like I am being hugged on all sides after about 20 minutes of soaking. I feel so refreshed and healthier after each bath using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Lazar

customer_reviews.title: great packaging and clean product
customer_reviews.text: grain is perfect for DIY body scrubs. It does leave that feel of just bathing in the Dead Sea used alone with some water. Adding natural oils and essential oils to make body/hand scrub leaves skin so smooth and clean feel. I highly recommend this product. Shipment was also fast. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DIYmom

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love bathing in this. I have bad eczema so it really helps me with that
customer_reviews.author: Van Lam

customer_reviews.title: Pure, fine-grain salt.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this salt is fine grained and pure from Israel. I use it as a face and body scrub. I also add it to my herbal hair rinse to give the rinse extra nourishing ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Overall the best choice in DSS
customer_reviews.text: If you are suffering from T.S.W. (see itsan.org) this is a must have for the bath. Minera is the best quality and value I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Value
customer_reviews.text: Quality dead sea salt. I am lucky enough to have a huge bath tub, and these big bags at this price are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: LucyNYC49

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Package
customer_reviews.text: The package is resealable. However, the first time I opened it after resealing it, one side of the seal ripped from the package so it can no longer be sealed. Had to put in a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Maddux

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works but doesn’t have a smell because it’s not supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Valcat23

customer_reviews.title: Minera Dead Sea Salt are perfect for my small batch body scrubs
customer_reviews.text: Minera Dead Sea Salt are perfect for my small batch body scrubs. The granules dissolve quickly and there's no doubt that I'm getting a quality, reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Jemila

customer_reviews.title: I have been to the Dead Sea so I was sceptical.
customer_reviews.text: I had no reason to be. This bath made me feel very good. Extra good. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Free

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I use this to soak my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use this to soak my feet after a long day at work.
customer_reviews.author: TMarie

customer_reviews.title: Psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriasis on my legs and used this as a soak for two weeks and saw a very noticeable difference in the patches breaking up and clearing up and looking better, less redness and general itching
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Heard great things and looking forward to results!
customer_reviews.text: I’m addicted to these Dead Sea salts! I’m so glad to be able to order these and get them delivered so I’m never out.
customer_reviews.author: Tevfik

customer_reviews.title: This is very good Dead Sea Salt
customer_reviews.text: This is very good Dead Sea Salt. It leaves skin soft, it works great for soaking achey and sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ford-Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: ... in the hot tub before getting in makes a great soak.
customer_reviews.text: Couple cups in the hot tub before getting in makes a great soak.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: Great salts
customer_reviews.text: Great salts..seems to be helping my husbands psoriasis..especially if we are disciplined to soak his feet 4-5 nights a week in warm water with one cup of the Dead Sea salts..
customer_reviews.author: tamara montgomery

customer_reviews.title: ... it for the first time and I am really pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for the first time and I am really pleased with the product. It helps soothe my eczema!
customer_reviews.author: Pinweiwei

customer_reviews.title: Awessome in my little kiddie pool for a outside salt water bath!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe OA in my neck and my tub is too small so I got a 6 foot by 20 inch pool and use it as a outside salt water bath and combined with a bit of lavender Epsom for the mineral and its awesome. PS i got a cheap pool filter so if i have to toss it at he end of the summer , was well worth it to be able to reuse bath several times and relax.
customer_reviews.author: robert mcloone

customer_reviews.title: Reliable quick delivery of a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I have ordered the Sea Salts from MInera through Amazon. Deliver is always quick and correct. These salts made a great addition to the bath. Along with a few drops of essential oil and equal part Epsom salts, I have luxury bath salts for a fraction of pre-made bath salts cost.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin conditions
customer_reviews.text: I had a bout of allergic dermatitis caused by medication along with some psoriasis. This salt relieved the itching and helped the outer layer of skin soften ad slough off. I will continue to use it. It makes my hard water soft.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia C. Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Nothing amazing about these bath salts
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these many times, but I do not see any difference in my pain after I soak. I think tegular Epsom salts would be a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: GraceFaithLove

customer_reviews.title: The first step you can take to relieve stress and  promote healing
customer_reviews.text: This product helped to relieve the itch of psoriasis during a particularly intense flare up. Soaking softened the skin and allowed applied creams and ointments to penetrate more effectively. Along with subsequent light therapy I have experienced relief and healing at present.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: This product has been instrumental over time (along with phototherapy) in lessening my severe psoriasis to the point that it appears that it will heal 100% at some point. The seller packages the product very well, and shipping was faster than expected... also, the pricing was better than anyone else I could find ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sea salt ever
customer_reviews.text: Best sea salt ever! I feel like a million dollars after taking a sea salt bath. I take two a day. A must for every home - great for children and animals. Just put a little in a child’s bath and they sleep wonderful. sea salt baths clear the mental and emotional bodies causing pain and distress.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Firkus

customer_reviews.title: Causes Feminine Itching
customer_reviews.text: I do have sensitive skin, but since this wasn't scented, I didn't think that I would have a problem with this--WRONG. This has caused me no small amount of uncomfort in the LADY AREA. Just be warned
customer_reviews.author: Gym Girl in T-Town

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with skin issues
customer_reviews.text: I use it to treat my eczema. I take a 20 min bath with 2 cups of salt twice a week. It has really cleared up my skin.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baum

customer_reviews.title: Brand loyal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand we will use in our hot tub. Tried others that left it cloudy or smelled funny.
customer_reviews.author: AK Fort

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product to use in the bath and to use on the skin to exfoliate. Gentle and fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this regularly for bath salts for several years. I mix it with Epsom salts.
customer_reviews.author: SoMiKo

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the quality and incredibly fast shipping! We take baths nightly and love this product to aid in skin sensitivities.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Really good so far. Using this along with African black soap for psoriasis.
customer_reviews.author: Strickcw1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful, I absolutely love it! My skin feels so much better after soaking in the tub with it, I struggle with psoriasis. I have not found a better sea salt at a better price!
customer_reviews.author: P Yosick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I made Dead Sea salt scrub with this product. It is consistently great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A

customer_reviews.title: Soothing!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff and does not discolor tub like some other products.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: #1 Quality Dead Sea Salt
customer_reviews.text: As good as any 'Dead Sea Salt' gets -- You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Etty M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and value. I add a few drops of aromatherapy oil and soak a few times a week listening to a meditation app. What a great slice of time during a busy week!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: It detox’s my body
customer_reviews.text: I put up to a cup in my bath after I mix in essential oils like frankincense and whatever else! Very relaxing and the oils I add scent the bath!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Love fine grain
customer_reviews.text: Always order. I use after PT charioprctor,massage I jet tub. I also use to make lovely Dead,Sea salts with essential oils .
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Hope

product_meta.title: Minera Dead Sea Salt - 15 lb. (Qty 3 x 5 lb. Bags) Fine Grain
feature_bullets: RELIEVE PSORIASIS, ECZEMA & ACNE: A safe, natural alternative to treating skin conditions. According to published studies, about 80%-90% of psoriasis patients visiting the Dead Sea for treatment, experience significant improvement of their skin. Available in Fine (0-1.7 mm).

CLEANSE, SOFTEN AND DETOXIFY SKIN: Dead Sea Salt’s unique mineral composition gives this salt its therapeutic qualities for skin care. While most sea salts are primarily Sodium Chloride; Dead Sea Salt is comprised of 21 beneficial minerals including: Magnesium, Potassium, Calcium, Bromide and Sulfur.
HIGH MINERAL CONTENT FOR BATHING ONLY: Dead Sea Salt is for BATH/SPA use only and is NOT a food-grade salt suitable for consumption.

FINE GRAIN, CERTIFIED AUTHENTIC - ALL NATURAL: Our Minera Dead Sea Salt is the same 100% pure, mineral-rich salt used in spas and treatment centers around the Dead Sea in Israel. Minera Dead Sea Salt has NOT been mineral depleted or blended with other salts as many “Dead Sea Salts” sold on the market today.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: The San Francisco Bath Salt Company is confident that you will be happy with the quality of our products and stand behind every single item. If you are not satisfied with your purchase return the product for a full refund.
